summary: This is an email chain from August 9, 2019, between FBI personnel in New York, forwarding a 'LSJ Securing Plan' related to crisis management and referencing the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force. The subject appears to be operational planning, possibly related to the Epstein case following his arrest.

persons.name: Staff Operations Specialist FBI New York
persons.context: Sends an email to FBI colleagues regarding a 'Target Package' for Crisis Management folks and wishes them safe travels.

events.title: Email regarding LSJ Securing Plan
events.description: An FBI Staff Operations Specialist emails colleagues to ensure they have a 'Target Package' created for Crisis Management personnel, referencing a securing plan.
personsInvolved: Staff Operations Specialist FBI New York

keyFacts: The email is dated August 9, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019.
The subject references a 'LSJ Securing Plan', with 'LSJ' likely referring to Epstein.
The correspondence involves the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force, indicating coordinated law enforcement activity.
The email mentions a 'Target Package' for 'Crisis Management folks', suggesting operational planning related to the case.
The document identifier EFTA00147091 is part of the Epstein case files released by the DOJ.
